page.caption: main
page.name: main
page.title: Hoofd
page.content:
company

  • founded in 2012
  • based in the Netherlands
  • focus on businesses with frequent customer interactions and repetitive transactions
  • successful in customer process optimization and customer lifetime value improvement
  • excellent track record in different industries: utilities, financial services, contact centers


Read More

challenge

  • identify, attract and contract customers
  • understand customers and interact
  • serve customers and create value


READ MORE


solution

  • consulting services
  • customer journey mapping
  • customer process redesign
  • crm & billing solution design
  • crm & billing solution implementation (system and/or services)
  • crm & billing support programme (SaaS, ASP or BPO)


READ MORE
